mapper.select: select activity.act_id,activity.`name`,activity.act_status,rule.conditions,activity.member_lv_ids,activity.start_time,activity.end_time from t_activity_full_reduce activity,t_activity_rules rule where rule.rule_id=activity.rule_id and activity.activity_type='2'

update t_activity_full_reduce
rule_id = #{ruleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
apply_start_time = #{applyStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
apply_end_time = #{applyEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
store_type = #{storeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

activity_type = #{activityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
join_times = #{joinTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where act_id = #{actId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
